```{=html}
<style>
/* Prevent page scroll - only panels scroll */
html, body {
  overflow: hidden !important;
  height: 100vh !important;
}

/* Hide page title */
#title-block-header {
  display: none !important;
}

/* Full width overrides for Quarto */
#quarto-content {
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}

#quarto-content.page-columns {
  display: block !important;
}

main.content,
#quarto-document-content {
  max-width: 100% !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}
</style>

<!-- Load PDF.js -->
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/pdf.js/3.11.174/pdf.min.js"></script>

<!-- Load MathJax -->
<script>
window.MathJax = {
  tex: {
    inlineMath: [['\\(', '\\)']],
    displayMath: [['\\[', '\\]']],
    processEscapes: true
  },
  options: {
    skipHtmlTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre']
  }
};
</script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mathjax@3/es5/tex-mml-chtml.js" async></script>

<div class="slides-page-container">
  <!-- Week Selector Bar -->
  <div class="slides-week-selector">
    <label for="week-select">Semaine :</label>
    <select id="week-select">
      <option value="">Chargement...</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <!-- Split Panel Layout -->
  <div class="slides-split-panel">
    <!-- PDF Viewer Panel (Left) -->
    <div class="slides-pdf-panel">
      <div class="slides-pdf-toolbar">
        <button id="prev-page" class="slides-nav-btn" title="Page pr√©c√©dente">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20" fill="currentColor">
            <path d="M15.41 7.41L14 6l-6 6 6 6 1.41-1.41L10.83 12z"/>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <span id="page-info" class="slides-page-info">Page 1 / 1</span>
        <button id="next-page" class="slides-nav-btn" title="Page suivante">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20" fill="currentColor">
            <path d="M8.59 16.59L10 18l6-6-6-6-1.41 1.41L13.17 12z"/>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <div class="slides-toolbar-separator"></div>
        <button id="zoom-out" class="slides-nav-btn" title="Zoom arri√®re">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20" fill="currentColor">
            <path d="M19 13H5v-2h14v2z"/>
          </svg>
        </button>
        <span id="zoom-level" class="slides-zoom-info">100%</span>
        <button id="zoom-in" class="slides-nav-btn" title="Zoom avant">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20" fill="currentColor">
            <path d="M19 13h-6v6h-2v-6H5v-2h6V5h2v6h6v2z"/>
          </svg>
        </button>
      </div>
      <div class="slides-pdf-canvas-container" id="pdf-container">
        <div class="slides-pdf-loading" id="pdf-loading">
          <div class="slides-loading-spinner"></div>
          <span>Chargement du PDF...</span>
        </div>
        <canvas id="pdf-canvas"></canvas>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Resize Handle -->
    <div class="slides-resize-handle" id="resize-handle"></div>

    <!-- Chat Panel (Right) -->
    <div class="slides-chat-panel" id="chat-panel">
      <div class="slides-chat-header">
        <h3>Assistant Slides</h3>
        <div class="slides-style-selector">
          <button class="slides-style-btn active" data-style="classique" title="Style classique">
            <span class="style-emoji">üß≠</span>
            <span class="style-label">Classique</span>
          </button>
          <button class="slides-style-btn" data-style="fun" title="Style fun">
            <span class="style-emoji">ü§©</span>
            <span class="style-label">Fun</span>
          </button>
          <button class="slides-style-btn" data-style="sceptique" title="Style sceptique">
            <span class="style-emoji">ü§®</span>
            <span class="style-label">Sceptique</span>
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Context Banner -->
      <div class="slides-context-banner" id="context-banner">
        <div class="slides-context-week" id="context-week">Semaine 1</div>
        <div class="slides-context-slide" id="context-slide">Slide 1: Chargement...</div>
      </div>

      <!-- AI Disclaimer Banner -->
      <div class="ai-disclaimer-banner">
        ‚ö†Ô∏è Les r√©ponses de l'IA peuvent contenir des erreurs. V√©rifie toujours avec tes supports de cours.
      </div>

      <!-- Messages Area -->
      <div class="slides-chat-messages" id="chat-messages">
        <div class="slides-chat-welcome">
          Pose tes questions sur la slide affich√©e.<br>
          Je peux t'expliquer les concepts, les formules, ou te donner des exemples.
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Input Area -->
      <div class="slides-chat-input-area">
        <input type="text" id="chat-input" placeholder="Pose ta question sur cette slide..." autocomplete="off">
        <button class="slides-chat-send" id="chat-send">
          <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20" fill="currentColor">
            <path d="M2.01 21L23 12 2.01 3 2 10l15 2-15 2z"/>
          </svg>
        </button>
      </div>

      <!-- Token Display -->
      <div class="slides-token-info">
        <div class="slides-token-bar-container">
          <div class="slides-token-bar" id="token-bar"></div>
        </div>
        <span class="slides-token-text" id="token-text">Tokens: -- / --</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
